name: Shadow of The Nothing
description:
Ludum Dare 45 Entry

A Zelda (NES) inspired procedurally generated dungeon jaunt. You'll need to find a weapon and fend off monsters as you make your way to the center of the planet and stop The Nothing that is encompassing your world. 

We didn't have time to get in all the features we imagined (like extra items, room puzzles, and locked rooms), but hopefully there is still something there for you to enjoy.

Music is from a previous project, so we're opting out of that category.
